sense.def:
Izraz
he
uporabljamo za moškega, dečka ali živalskega samca, ki smo ga že prej omenili in čigar identiteta je poznana.

seg.quote: Bill had flown back from New York and he and his wife took me out to dinner.

sense.def:
He
se lahko nanaša tudi na osebo, katere spol ni znan ali pojasnjen;

seg.quote: A teacher should do whatever he thinks best.
